org.forgerock.openidm.audit.impl

Class AbstractAuditLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openidm.audit.impl.AbstractAuditLogger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AuditLogger
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CSVAuditLogger, RepoAuditLogger, RouterAuditLogger

    public abstract class AbstractAuditLogger
extends Object
implements AuditLogger
    Abstract audit logger to implement common attributes.
